post.text: "That reporter and I have the same condition. When Mr. Trump made fun of him, that hurt my feelings."

comment.author: Kyleigha
comment.text: He's disgusting. Never mind boy! We'll beat him... he'll never become our President.

replies.author: Kyleigha
replies.text: Trump, the CON CHAMP! Beware what you wish for... it might come true and you will realize that no more USA before our own eyes because it will be America-Russia
